Deep Dish Pizza

29 Dec 2022

While making pie last week, I decided making a deep dish pizza was the natural next step. (Plus, the deep dish at Regents’ Pizzeria is really something). When I found that Sally’s Baking Addiction had a recipe that’s really all I needed to get started. It wasn’t the prettiest pizza, but I think it tasted decent. I may have also pushed the limits on how deep a pizza can really get.
